CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 短的；短期的；短暂的；不足；缺乏；缺少（某种品质）；（呼吸）短促；少于；简略的；个子矮的；短音的；紧俏
不足地；缺乏地；缺少地；突然地；唐突地；简略地；简短地；短暂地
（尤指在正片前放映的）短片电影；短音；短音节；短路；卖空者；细麸粉；短期证券；少量烈酒
短路；使短路；卖空（股票等）；做空；空头操作；故意少给…的零头

synonym.mean: 短的；不足的；急速的；唐突的

word_group.brief_definition: 短发；短头发；短短的头发
少于, 不足, 未达到, 除(某种极端行为)以外

bilingual.source: Ned is a short name for boys.
bilingual.target: 内德是一个简短的男孩名字。

bilingual.source: Meg is a short name for girls.
bilingual.target: 梅格是一个简短的女孩名字。

bilingual.source: Have a short meeting in the classroom.
bilingual.target: 在教室里开一个简短的会议。

bilingual.source: The author uses some very short sentences.
bilingual.target: 作者使用了一些非常短的句子。

bilingual.source: The first question only needs a short answer.
bilingual.target: 第一个问题只需要一个简短的回答。

bilingual.source: Organise your answers above into a short paragraph.
bilingual.target: 把你上面的回答组织成一个简短的段落。

bilingual.source: Talk about your suggestions and prepare a short presentation.
bilingual.target: 讨论你的建议并准备一个简短的演示。

bilingual.source: Short closed questions often begin with who, what, why, when, how.
bilingual.target: 简短的封闭性问题通常以谁、什么、为什么、何时、如何开头。

bilingual.source: She's quite tall, with short fair hair, and she's wearing glasses.
bilingual.target: 她很高，有短的浅色头发，戴着眼镜。

bilingual.source: A short explanation will suffice for now.
bilingual.target: 简短的解释目前就足够了。

list.abstract: short是定义一种整型变量家族的一种。例如short i；表示定义一个短 整型的变量i。同时也是一个英文单词，意为：短的，短暂的。
《SHORT》是韩国tvN电视台于2018年02月12日首播的短道速滑题材电视剧，由金应民执导，金正爱编剧，姜泰伍、吕会铉主演。 该剧讲述了两名短道速滑运动员爱上了一名女团练习生的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: I'mma hit you with a super short list, man, because it's, there's nothing on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要给你一份超级短的清单，老爸，因为，上面是空白的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: From the promenade, hop aboard an historic Star Ferry for the short crossing to Hong Kong Island.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由海滨公园登上历史悠久的天星小轮，在短短的旅程您便可以横渡维港到达香港岛。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoever pulls the short crust... Come on, Dad. No, I don't want to do that. Fine! You all want to go, then go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁抽到了最短的披萨边…别呀，老爸，我不想抽签。好吧，如果你们都想走，就走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Make it short. We're loading up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长话短说，我们要起飞了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now I know why you stopped short.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你那时候为什么停车了。

yingyinNormal.en: Long story short, they have seven HBOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长话短说，就是他们有七个电影频道。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a short list. Great. I like it. Focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那清单非常短。很好，我喜欢，讲重点。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: Short-term memory loss. I don't believe this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 短期失忆症，我不信这个。

yingyinNormal.en: A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快是快，我当时都没指望能活下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for seeing me on such short notice, Peter. Jim.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你这么快赶过来，彼得。吉姆。

yingyinNormal.en: Serena's visit was short and apparently not very sweet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑟琳娜的拜访很仓促，而且非常不愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you know what's cool? Short guys with big penises?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们知道什么事很酷吗？矮个子大鸡鸡吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Lucas called me short.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢卡斯骂我是个矮子。

yingyinNormal.en: Short answer is don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简单来说就是，别这么干。

yingyinNormal.en: You can call me Si. It's short for Simon. And I'm Be. It's short for Belinda. I'm Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以叫我西，这是西蒙的简称。你们可以叫我贝，这是贝琳达的简称。我是佩奇。

yingyinNormal.en: "Joe" Short for "Joseph." "Jay" Short for "Jaysus." It's the only way it makes sense. But he's the child. You're overthinking it.
yingyinNormal.zh: “乔”是约[乔]瑟夫的简称，“杰”是“杰”稣的简称。只有这样才讲得通。但他才是宝宝。你想多了。

yingyinNormal.en: We know you're a busy man. We'll try to make this short.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们知道你是个大忙人，我们也想快点完事。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to thank you all for coming on such short notice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要感谢你们能这么快就赶过来。

yingyinNormal.en: And I also got two more apples. We're four short of a bushel!
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且我还多拿了两个苹果。还差四个就可以做水果花篮了！

yingyinNormal.en: It's safe with the Vision. These days safe is in short supply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它在幻视手里是安全的，如今安全也是一种奢侈了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不足；简略；短小；脆性
v. 缩短；减少；缩；缩小；使（元音；音节）发短音

word_family.mean: adj. 短的；短暂的；简短的；短元音的；简慢的；粗暴无礼的；概率大的；松脆的；短促的；不足的

sense_info_list.en: lasting or taking a small amount of time

examination_example.sentence: That is a very <highlight>short</highlight> timeline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个非常短的时间线。

examination_example.sentence: "<highlight>Short</highlight>-termism" or the desire for quick profits, has worsened in publicly traded companies, says the Bank of England's top economist, Andrew Haldane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国央行首席经济学家Andrew Haldane表示，在上市公司中，“短期主义”或对快速利润的渴望在上市公司中已经恶化。

examination_example.sentence: The emerging consensus around the bill is a sign that legislators are getting frightened about a politically embarrassing <highlight>short</highlight>-term collapse at the USPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围绕该法案的共识正在形成，这表明立法者们对美国邮政服务公司在政治上令人难堪的短时崩溃感到不安。

sense_info_list.en: small in length, distance, or height

examination_example.sentence: watched <highlight>shorter</highlight> video clips
examination_example.sentence_trans: 观看较短的视频剪辑

examination_example.sentence: In addition, new digital technologies have allowed more rapid trading of equities, quicker use of information, and thus <highlight>shorter</highlight> attention spans in financial markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，新的数字技术使得股票交易更加迅速，信息的使用更加迅速，从而缩短了金融市场的注意力广度。

examination_example.sentence: So we assume it was <highlight>shorter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我们假设它更短。

examination_example.sentence: Dickens, who had a reporter's eye for transcribing the life around him, especially anything comic or odd, submitted <highlight>short</highlight> sketches to obscure magazines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狄更斯以记者的眼光记录他周围的生活，尤其是任何滑稽或奇怪的事情，他给一些不知名的杂志写了一些短篇小品。

examination_example.sentence: Buddhist priests offer a <highlight>short</highlight> sermon and recite prayers of blessing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佛教僧侣们会进行一场简短的布道，并念诵表达祝福的祈祷词。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>short</highlight>, these are the types of jobs that machines can perform much better at than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，这些都是机器可以比人类做得更好的工作。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2012 survey, 71 percent of tree-fruit growers and almost 80 percent of raisin and berry growers said they were <highlight>short</highlight> of labor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2012年的一项调查中，71%的树果种植者和近80%的葡萄干和浆果种植者说他们缺少劳动力。

examination_example.sentence: It fell <highlight>short</highlight> of the latter's expectations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它没有达到后者的预期。

sense_info_list.en: before the arranged or expected time or place
trousers that end above the knee or reach the knee
used to say that a name is used as a shorter form of another name

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 少于；不足；未达到；除(某种极端行为)以外

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 立刻；马上；不久；简短地；扼要地；简慢地；唐突地；草率地；不耐烦地；不友善地
v. 缩短；减少；缩；缩小；使（元音；音节）发短音

word_family.mean: adj. 短的；短暂的；简短的；短元音的；简慢的；粗暴无礼的；概率大的；松脆的；短促的；不足的

sense_info_list.en: being an amount of time that is less than average or usual

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>short</highlight> term, perhaps they are right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从短期来看，也许他们是对的。

examination_example.sentence: Occasionally, it's because they're pressured to finish in a <highlight>short</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，这是因为他们被迫要在短时间内完成。

examination_example.sentence: This includes the impact of <highlight>short</highlight>-term lets on housing costs and quality of life for residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这包括短期出租对居民住房成本和生活质量的影响。

sense_info_list.en: small in length, distance, or height

examination_example.sentence: And we had to evacuate at very <highlight>short</highlight> notice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不得不在很短的时间内撤离。

examination_example.sentence: Mass-produced cars marketed as symbols of individuality and of freedom when most of their lives will be spent making <highlight>short</highlight> journeys on choked roads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量生产的汽车被宣传为个性和自由的象征，而他们的大部分生命都将在拥挤的道路上进行短途旅行。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to write an essay related to the <highlight>short</highlight> passage given below.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于这一部分，你有30分钟的时间来写一篇与下面的短文有关的文章。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>short</highlight>, managers should be ongoing role models for the change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，管理者应该成为变革的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: When Tim Joseph started his business, he found grass-fed products fell <highlight>short</highlight> of demand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tim Joseph 开始他的事业时，发现草饲产品供不应求。

sense_info_list.en: before the arranged or expected time or place

examination_example.sentence: Why did you cut the expedition <highlight>short</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么缩短这次探险？

sense_info_list.en: trousers that end above the knee or reach the knee

word_usage.usage:
short本身可表示“身材矮小”，无需加in height，且不用low表示。
示例：他身材矮小。
误 He is short in height.
误 He is low.
正 He is short.

be short of 意为“缺乏”，而be short for 意为“是...的简写”。
示例：Lab is short for laboratory.
Lab是laboratory的缩略形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 立刻；马上；不久；简短地；扼要地；简慢地；唐突地；草率地；不耐烦地；不友善地
v. 缩短；减少；缩；缩小；使（元音；音节）发短音

word_family.mean: adj. 短的；短暂的；简短的；短元音的；简慢的；粗暴无礼的；概率大的；松脆的；短促的；不足的

sense_info_list.en: being an amount of time that is less than average or usual

examination_example.sentence: If you do several jobs in a relatively <highlight>short</highlight> span of time, prospective employers might perceive that you lack loyalty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在相对较短的时间内做了几份工作，潜在的雇主可能会认为你缺乏忠诚度。

examination_example.sentence: And the rises were <highlight>short</highlight>-lived: prices typically returned to normal with the nest harvest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且这种上涨是短暂的：价格通常会在收获季节时回归正常。

examination_example.sentence: Anxiety and depression more often than not cut <highlight>short</highlight> one's life span.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 焦虑和抑郁往往会缩短人的寿命。

examination_example.sentence: Even those <highlight>short</highlight> of time or money should be encouraged to cook for themselves and their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要鼓励那些即便是没有时间或缺钱的人为自己和家人做饭。

sense_info_list.en: small in length; distance; or height

examination_example.sentence: But they are generally reading <highlight>short</highlight> texts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他们一般都是读短文。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine going from reading texts as <highlight>short</highlight> as one or two sentences to trying to read entire books written in complex language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，从阅读短至一两句话的文本到尝试阅读用复杂语言编写的整本书。

examination_example.sentence: Changed fashion in <highlight>short</highlight>-distance travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 短途旅行的方式改变。

sense_info_list.en: used to say that a name is used as a shorter form of another name

word_usage.usage:
be short of 意为“缺乏”，而be short for 意为“是...的简写”。
示例：Lab is short for laboratory.
Lab是laboratory的缩略形式。

short本身可表示“身材矮小”，无需加in height，且不用low表示。
示例：他身材矮小。
误 He is short in height.
误 He is low.
正 He is short.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 立刻；马上；不久；简短地；扼要地；简慢地；唐突地；草率地；不耐烦地；不友善地
v. 缩短；减少；缩；缩小；使（元音；音节）发短音

word_family.mean: adj. 短的；短暂的；简短的；短元音的；简慢的；粗暴无礼的；概率大的；松脆的；短促的；不足的

examination_example.sentence: Art is long, life is <highlight>short</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术是漫长的，生命是短暂的。

examination_example.sentence: After a <highlight>short</highlight> way, the farmer stopped and pointed at a weed which we missed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走了一小段路后，农夫停下脚步，指着我们错过的一片杂草。

examination_example.sentence: And we'll pour about 30 percent more liquid into a <highlight>short</highlight>, wide glass than a tall, skinny glass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会在一个短而宽的杯子里倒入比高而细的杯子多30%的液体。

examination_example.sentence: Last week she walked up to the store, but when she went to pay for her groceries, she was <highlight>short</highlight> about three dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，她走到商店，但当她去支付食品杂货时，她缺了大约三美元。

examination_example.sentence: He is <highlight>short</highlight> of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他缺钱。

examination_example.sentence: It might seem unkind to cut people <highlight>short</highlight> when they interrupt you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当别人打断你的时候，打断别人似乎是不友善的。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>short</highlight>, he loves postcards, and the excitement of getting a hand-written note from someone far away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，他喜欢明信片，以及收到远方某人手写的便条时的兴奋感。

examination_example.sentence: So even if your own efforts at humor fall <highlight>short</highlight>, you might be freeing the long kept humor in others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，即使你自己在幽默方面的努力没有达到预期效果，你也可能在释放别人长期以来的幽默感。

examination_example.sentence: What the plants pump through the air is a mixture of chemicals known as volatile organic compounds, VOCs for <highlight>short</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物从空气中吸入的是一种被称为挥发性有机化合物的化学混合物，简称VOCs。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 缩短；减少；缩；缩小；使（元音；音节）发短音
n. 不足；简略；短小；脆性
adv. 立刻；马上；不久；简短地；扼要地；简慢地；唐突地；草率地；不耐烦地；不友善地

word_family.mean: adj. 短的；短暂的；简短的；短元音的；简慢的；粗暴无礼的；概率大的；松脆的；短促的；不足的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 短发；短头发；短短的头发

sense_info_list.en: lasting or taking a small amount of time

examination_example.sentence: Because of a long cold winter, Iceland has a <highlight>short</highlight> growing season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于漫长而寒冷的冬天，冰岛的生长季节很短。

examination_example.sentence: Astronauts lived in these space stations for a <highlight>short</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宇航员在这些空间站里生活了一小段时间。

examination_example.sentence: Our lifetime is <highlight>short</highlight>, so we should make good use of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的生命是短暂的，所以我们应该好好利用它。

sense_info_list.en: small in length, distance, or height

examination_example.sentence: In the end, the real criminal is a <highlight>short</highlight> heavy man and he has <highlight>short</highlight> brown hair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，真正的罪犯是一个又矮又胖的男人，他有一头棕色的短发。

examination_example.sentence: He is so <highlight>short</highlight> that he can't reach the books on the shelf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他太矮了，够不到书架上的书。

examination_example.sentence: Bob is much tall now, the jeans he wore last year are too <highlight>short</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鲍勃现在高多了，他去年穿的牛仔裤太短了。

examination_example.sentence: His speech was <highlight>short</highlight>, but all to the point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的演讲很简短，但却切中要害。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>short</highlight>, I wanted to conquer（ 征服）the world!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总之，我要征服世界!

examination_example.sentence: He wrote <highlight>short</highlight> stories and soon he was well-known.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他写短篇小说，很快就出名了。

examination_example.sentence: Women and children were <highlight>short</highlight> of food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 妇女和儿童缺乏食物。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of giving all your attention to what you are <highlight>short</highlight> of, look at how lucky you already are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其把所有的注意力都放在你所缺少的东西上，不如看看你已经有多幸运吧。

examination_example.sentence: Many students are <highlight>short</highlight> of exercise in their spare time now
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，许多学生在空余时间缺乏锻炼。

word_usage.usage:
short本身可表示“身材矮小”，无需加in height，且不用low表示。
示例：他身材矮小。
误 He is short in height.
误 He is low.
正 He is short.

be short of 意为“缺乏”，而be short for 意为“是...的简写”。
示例：Lab is short for laboratory.
Lab是laboratory的缩略形式。
